name: Horse Hat Gun
description:
HORSE HAT GUN is a Honey Heist-inspired micro-RPG of wild west outlaws planning and completing a daring, dangerous and wildly improbable heist.  

You and your pards are about to pull the biggest heist of your lives as a gang of outlaws in the bad, wild west. Each of you will be armed with the greatest weapons known to man: your horse, your hat and your gun. You have planned the heist meticulously and it’s up to you to make sure your elaborate plans go off without a hitch.

This game is meant for short sessions up to two hours long and is meant to be lighthearted, comedic and action packed. All you need is a pen or pencil, paper, a bunch of six-sided dice and between 3 and 7 people (1 game master and 2-6 players).
